title: Installation Completes Successfully
description: Verify that the installer runs on Windows 10+ and completes setup, creating desktop and start menu shortcuts as expected.

steps.description: Run the provided installer on a clean Windows 10 or later machine.
Follow the installer steps with default options.
Verify installation completes without errors.
Confirm that desktop shortcut is created and points to the installed application.
Confirm that start menu shortcut is created and launches the application.

title: User Login With Valid Credentials
description: Check that users with valid credentials can log in and are directed to the appropriate UI based on their role (ADMIN, MANAGER, SALES_EXECUTIVE).

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username/email and password for an ADMIN user.
Click the login button.
Verify login is successful and ADMIN dashboard is displayed.
Log out and repeat login for MANAGER role.
Verify MANAGER-specific UI and access rights.
Log out and repeat login for SALES_EXECUTIVE role.
Verify SALES_EXECUTIVE-specific UI and access rights.

title: User Login With Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login attempts with invalid credentials fail with appropriate error message and no access granted.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Enter invalid username/email and/or password.
Click the login button.
Verify login is rejected with an error message indicating invalid credentials.
Verify no sensitive UI or data is displayed.

title: Lead Creation and Retrieval
description: Verify that users can create new sales leads with all required fields and retrieve lead details correctly.

steps.description: Login as a user with lead creation permissions.
Navigate to lead management page.
Create a new lead with valid data for all mandatory fields.
Verify lead is saved successfully and appears in the lead list.
Open the lead detail modal or page.
Verify all lead data is displayed accurately.

title: Lead Update and Status Transition
description: Test updating lead information, including changing status across pipeline stages and verifying data persistence.

steps.description: Select an existing lead.
Modify details such as contact information and update lead status to a new pipeline stage.
Save changes.
Verify that updates are persisted and reflected correctly on lead listing and detail view.

title: Lead Deletion and Bulk Operations
description: Verify single and bulk deletion of leads operate correctly, including confirmation dialogs and removal from UI.

steps.description: Select a single lead and initiate delete action.
Verify confirmation prompt is shown.
Confirm deletion.
Verify lead is removed from list and database.
Select multiple leads using checkboxes.
Initiate bulk delete action.
Verify confirmation prompt includes count of selected leads.
Confirm deletion.
Verify all selected leads are removed from UI and backend.

title: Lead Search With Debounced Input
description: Verify that lead search input responds with debouncing under 300ms and returns accurate filtered results.

steps.description: Navigate to lead listing page with large dataset (1000+ leads).
Type a partial search keyword continuously in the lead search field.
Verify search input debounces and triggers query only after user stops typing.
Verify results correctly match the search term without duplicates or omissions.

title: Virtual Scrolling Performance on Lead List
description: Verify smooth virtual scrolling performance at 60fps for lead lists with over 1000 records.

steps.description: Open lead management page with a dataset exceeding 1000 leads.
Scroll quickly through the lead list vertically.
Confirm the UI remains responsive and no lag or stuttering occurs.
Validate visible leads update correctly without rendering glitches.

title: Convert Lead to Case Workflow
description: Test the conversion of a qualified lead to a case, with correct copying of relevant data and workflow initialization.

steps.description: Select a lead marked as qualified.
Trigger the 'Convert to Case' operation.
Verify a case is created with appropriate data mapped from the lead.
Confirm the newly created case correctly appears in the case management workflow with initial stage.

title: Case Management Workflow Stage Update
description: Ensure users can update case workflow stages and that the status changes persist correctly across the system.

steps.description: Open an existing case detail.
Change the workflow stage to the next valid stage.
Save the case details.
Verify that case stage update is saved and reflected in all views listing this case.

title: Document Upload, Versioning and Encryption
description: Verify document uploads attach to cases with file versioning and are stored encrypted per retention policy.

steps.description: On a case detail page, upload a document for the first time.
Verify the document appears in the attached documents list.
Upload an updated version of the same document.
Verify version increment and previous version is retained.
Check backend storage confirms encryption of the stored documents.

title: Lead Bulk Import from JSON, CSV, Excel
description: Test bulk importing leads using JSON, CSV, and Excel formats with valid data and password protection where applicable.

steps.description: Access bulk import UI.
Upload a valid JSON file containing multiple leads.
Confirm import prompts for password if the file is encrypted.
Provide correct password and submit.
Verify all leads are imported and visible in the list.
Repeat import process for CSV file with correct format.
Verify proper import with no data loss.
Repeat with Excel file ensuring static import functionality.
Verify Excel leads are imported correctly and all data fields map accurately.

title: Lead Bulk Export with Password Protection
description: Verify bulk export of lead data in JSON, CSV, and Excel formats with password protection enforced for exported files.

steps.description: Navigate to bulk export UI.
Select format JSON and initiate export.
Set password protection for export file.
Verify exported file is generated with encryption/password applied.
Repeat export in CSV and Excel formats.
Validate all exported files are password protected and data integrity is maintained.

title: Email Campaign Creation and Management
description: Test creation, editing, and deletion of email campaigns and templates with proper data validation and save persistence.

steps.description: Access email campaign management interface.
Create a new email campaign with valid inputs: subject, recipients, schedule.
Verify campaign is saved and listed.
Edit the campaign changing subject and content.
Verify changes are saved.
Delete the created campaign.
Confirm campaign is removed from the list.

title: Email Inbox Sync and Email-to-Lead Conversion
description: Verify that incoming emails synchronize correctly into inboxes and emails can be converted into lead records automatically.

steps.description: Ensure inbox sync is enabled.
Send an email to the system email address.
Verify the email appears in the user's synchronized inbox.
Use the email-to-lead conversion feature on the synced email.
Verify a new lead is created with email data correctly populated.

title: Outgoing Webhook Subscription and Retry Logic
description: Test subscribing to outgoing webhooks, event delivery, handling failed deliveries with retries, and delivery tracking.

steps.description: Subscribe a webhook URL to outgoing event notifications.
Trigger an event that should cause webhook delivery.
Verify webhook receives the payload successfully.
Temporarily disable the webhook endpoint to simulate failure.
Trigger another event.
Confirm retry logic attempts redelivery several times.
Verify delivery status and retry counts are tracked and visible.

title: Calendar Event Scheduling and Sync
description: Ensure users can schedule calendar events linked to leads, receive follow-up reminders, and that calendar synchronization functions correctly.

steps.description: Create a calendar event linked to a specific lead.
Verify event appears in calendar view.
Set a reminder for the event.
Confirm reminder notification appears at the scheduled time.
Perform calendar synchronization with external calendar.
Verify events sync correctly in both directions without data loss.

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that users with different roles (ADMIN, MANAGER, SALES_EXECUTIVE) have permissions restricted to their role scope and cannot access unauthorized features or data.

steps.description: Login as SALES_EXECUTIVE.
Attempt to access admin-only features such as system settings or role management.
Verify access is denied and appropriate error or message is shown.
Login as MANAGER.
Attempt to access ADMIN-only controls.
Verify access is denied.
Verify each role can only perform the allowed CRUD operations on leads and cases.

title: Data Encryption at Rest Validation
description: Confirm that sensitive data including documents and lead information is encrypted at rest as per security requirements.

steps.description: Upload confidential document to a case.
Access the backend storage or database to verify the file is encrypted.
Locate lead and case records in database storage.
Verify sensitive fields are encrypted or hashed as required.

title: API Authentication and Rate Limiting Enforcement
description: Validate the REST API platform supports OAuth 2.0 and API key authentication with rate limiting and returns proper error codes on violation.

steps.description: Make API request using valid OAuth token.
Verify successful authentication and authorized response.
Make API request using invalid or expired OAuth token.
Verify 401 Unauthorized error is returned.
Make API request with valid API key.
Verify access granted.
Send rapid API requests exceeding rate limit.
Verify 429 Too Many Requests response and rate limiting enforced.

title: Multi-Tenant Data Isolation
description: Test that multi-tenancy is enforced by ensuring data segregation and no leakage or visibility across different tenant scopes.

steps.description: Login as user belonging to Tenant A.
Access leads, cases, and documents belonging to Tenant A.
Verify only Tenant A data is accessible.
Attempt to access data belonging to Tenant B via direct URL/API.
Verify access denied or data not found response.
Login as user belonging to Tenant B.
Repeat data access verification for Tenant B.

title: Dashboard Analytics and Usage Metrics Display
description: Verify that administrators and managers can view dashboards with accurate analytics charts, activity timelines, and system usage metrics.

steps.description: Login as ADMIN and navigate to dashboard.
Verify activity timeline shows recent actions and events.
Confirm usage metrics such as API calls, lead counts, and case stats display with correct values.
Login as MANAGER and verify access to the dashboard.
Confirm dashboard contents are consistent with role privileges.

title: Navigation and UI Responsiveness
description: Check that responsive navigation, tabs, modals, and UI components work correctly and are optimized for performance on Windows desktop environments.

steps.description: Navigate through different pages using navigation menu.
Verify navigation occurs without delay or UI glitches.
Open modals such as lead detail, document preview, and email templates.
Verify modals render correctly and can be closed.
Switch between tabs in UI components.
Confirm tab content updates correctly without reloading entire page.
Interact with input controls including dropdowns, text inputs, and checkboxes.
Verify inputs behave as expected and validate input where applicable.
